title: Silver 2 adc LF a support to duo with and climb to gold
body:
Hi

Im a silver 2 adc main, I play Lucian mostly but can also do cait, ezreal etc. Looking for someone who can duo with me during the day and get to Gold. Available 8am - 5pm. Can't play at night.

Don't have much requirements for supp, just don't flame and tilt. Prefer Naut or Janna as supp but it's ok if you don't main them.

IGN: Drose2046

Add me :)
